articles.title: Rare record for Rohit Sharma during Bangladesh ODI - ICC Cricket

articles.description: Case filed against Lakshya Sen, his parents, brother & coach accuses them of fudging his age to allow him to play in younger categories longer. His mother has said 'records are clear'.
